org.apache.oodt.cas.pge

Class PGETaskInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.pge.PGETaskInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowTaskInstance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StdPGETaskInstance, WinPGETaskInstance

    public class PGETaskInstance
extends Object
implements WorkflowTaskInstance
    Runs a CAS-style Product Generation Executive based on the PCS Wrapper Architecture from mattmann et al. on OCO.
    Author:
    mattmann (Chris Mattmann), bfoster (Brian Foster)

      • run

        public void run(Metadata metadata,
                WorkflowTaskConfiguration config)
         throws WorkflowTaskInstanceException
        Description copied from interface: WorkflowTaskInstance

        Runs the Task with the specified metadata context.

        Specified by:
        run in interface WorkflowTaskInstance
        Parameters:
        metadata - The TaskContext of metadata that is shared between the tasks.
        config - The static configuration metadata for this task.
        Throws:
        WorkflowTaskInstanceException
